channel.title: Azure Networking on KasdevTech
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Networking on KasdevTech

item.title: Azure VPN Gateway vs ExpressRoute – S2S vs P2S Explained
item.description: Understand how to connect your on-premises to Azure using VPN Gateway or ExpressRoute. Learn the difference between Site-to-Site and Point-to-Site.

item.title: Azure Virtual Network Basics – Public vs Private Networks
item.description: Understand the basics of Azure Virtual Networks, what public and private networks mean in the cloud, and how IPs work in Azure.

item.title: Azure Hub-Spoke Architecture & VNet Peering
item.description: Understand Hub-Spoke network architecture in Azure, how VNet peering works, and why it matters for enterprise design.
